title: 1.15.2计分板
author: 暮里魔理沙
txt_content:
创建一个记录部分方块挖掘数量的积分项目
然后让他显示在list（也就是tab部位）

创建计分项的时候准则只能填一个。。比如我要让这个计分板同时统计挖掘石头，圆石，花岗岩的数量
该怎么弄呢

replies.author: HolographicHat
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HolographicHat 于 2020-4-24 16:56 编辑 
暮里魔理沙 发表于 2020-4-24 16:21
建议看一遍帖子
如果这样能行我就不会来这里问问题了

scoreboard objectives add stoneScore minecraft.mined:minecraft.stone
scoreboard objectives add graniteScore minecraft.mined:minecraft.granite
scoreboard objectives add cobblestoneScore minecraft.mined:minecraft.cobblestone
scoreboard objectives add allScore0 dummy
scoreboard objectives add allScore1 dummy
scoreboard objectives setdisplay list allScore1
----上方命令执行一次即可，下方命令使用循环型命令方块执行
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s allScore0 = @s stoneScore
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s allScore0 += @s graniteScore
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s allScore1 = @s allScore0
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s allScore1 += @s cobblestoneScore

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
比如你创建了两个统计板，创建第三个记分板，这个命令可以让第三个记分板的分数等同于两个统计板的合

execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s board3 = @s board1
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s board3 += @s board2
